answers.answer: Maybe you should call you dr. and see what they suggest.  Diabeties is serious, Don't wait around if you think you might have it.

The symptoms you mention could be anything from normal to abnormal.  It's probably best to have your doctor do a urine test for you to see if there's sugar.  Usually, excessive weight gain, water retention and swelling on your hands and face are signs.

Weight gain for sure. I had it with my first baby (12 now) and it wasnt soooo horrible, as long as you control your diet. If you cant control it with your diet then you need to take the shots. Im nervous myself about this with this pregnancy. I have extreme thirst, hunger etc and Im only 8 weeks......Make sure to talk to your doctor about your concerns- hopefully its just the rough week that's making you feel that way.....good luck :)

question: i just have not felt right the last week - thirsty, tired, eating more, nausous, etc.  are these signs of gestational diabetes?  i go for my test this week...i have had a terrible week so i am not sure if it"s just that - we found out my 2yr old needs his tonsils and adenoids out on friday and i am a nervous mess about it, plus he is not sleeping well at all so i am exhausted...could it just be that???
title: worried i may have gestational diabetes.....questions here
